game_description: MOOD is the gym for your mental fitness. There are many paths toward a happier you. That’s why we strive to find the best instructors from a wide diversity of fields including: - All meditative & mystical traditions - Psychology & neuroscience - Practices rooted in music, art & movement - Peak performance coaching Our goal is for MOOD to house the most comprehensive library of mental well-being instructional content anywhere in the world NEW FEATURES IN THIS VERSION - Get to know more about the practitioners that are guiding you. - Find an experience that better suits you by filtering based on meditation categories. - Discover new practitioners joining our community and collaborating with us. - Now we have the ability to post brand new experiences every week. Give us your feedback! Email us: info@moonshot.la
review_2: Just experienced a VR meditation journey on MOOD. How do I feel? Energized, joyful, expanded!!! The visual journey is like a psychedelic trip enhanced by the musical score. Colorful geometrics pulled my psyche inwards as I experienced spaciousness and the state of simply “being”. Who says meditation needs to be boring!
review_3: Fantastic guided meditations. The visuals are beautiful but do not get in the way of the overall experience. It's not overwhelming for beginners and is deep enough for those who are experienced with meditation. Great job!!
review_4: You should probably just turn off the mediation words and find inner peace just with the visuals.
review_5: This app is absolutely Incredible, I love it. I've done all the meditation apps, I really dig this one. I will be Tripping with Mood on the Regular.
